ADDENDUM :
Mr. Olander had acute blood loss anemia from the combination of the gunshot wound to the right distal femur as well as requirements for urgent open reduction , internal fixation .
His hematocrit dropped down to the level of 20 .
Although he remained hemodynamically stable , we elected to move ahead and transfuse him with nonautologous PRBC .
Bertha Patrick , MD 20AAQ
Dictated By : Rose D. Bordelon , M.D.
